meanings.definition: Having carpels or pistils but no stamens.
meanings.sent1: The carpellate flowers in the garden are beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the carpellate structures of the plant.
meanings.sent3: The carpellate blooms seemed to be playing hide and seek with the stamens.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a canvas of carpellate wonders, devoid of stamens.
meanings.sent5: The absence of stamens made the carpellate flowers stand out like stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a flower that has carpels but no stamens.
meanings.sent1: The carpellate petals were delicate and colorful.
meanings.sent2: The florist arranged a bouquet of carpellate flowers for the event.
meanings.sent3: The carpellate blooms whispered secrets of their stamen-less nature.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the carpellate blossoms danced gracefully without stamens.
meanings.sent5: The carpellate blooms stood proudly, showcasing their unique floral structure.
